description:
Elden Ring is finally getting its much anticipated DLC in “Shadow of the Erdtree”. Currently, this is the only DLC expansion planned for Elden Ring, and it’s a big one. So, let’s talk about everything we know so far.

#gaming #EldenRing #ShadowOfTheErdtree #gamespot
title: Elden Ring Shadow Of The Erdtree Everything To Know
Dune: Awakening Game vs Dune Movies Comparison

description:
We saw a live gameplay demo of the upcoming Monster Hunter: Wilds, which showcased the game's new systems and deeper open world.

The world is bigger and filled with even more monsters to hunt, granting more opportunities to lure beasts into traps, or have them engage other monsters across the wilds, all before returning to town and enjoying some well earned, stat buffing cheese.

Your companions will also have more of a role in your hunts, meaning your pals and mounts will never be short of ways to assist you during battle or exploration.

Monster Hunter Wilds is set to release in 2025 on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series X|S
title: How Monster Hunter Wilds Uses Its Open World For A More Satisfying Hunt | Summer Game Fest 2024

description:
There’s a storm raging over Fortnite Festival! James Hetfield, Lars Ulrich, Kirk Hammett, and Robert Trujillo from Metallica are the Icons of Fortnite Festival Season 4 — and they’re not just here to perform, they’re here to battle. 

Season 4 will introduce the Battle Stage, a brand-new, musical PVP experience in Fortnite where 16 players will enter, but only one can emerge victorious. Compete against your opponents across a four-song setlist to be the last one standing when the curtain comes down and it all fades to black. The battle begins tomorrow with the launch of Fortnite Festival Season 4!
title: Fortnite Festival - Official Metallica Battle Stage Reveal Trailer

description:
Big storms and playable Ghouls! We played a little of Fallout 76's massive new expansion, Skyline Valley, and also learned more about the addition that so many Fallout fans have been waiting for - the ability to play as a ghoul.

Skyline Valley is Fallout 76's next big piece of content, expanding the wasteland south with a new storm-torn region to explore. Players will be able to uncover the mysteries of ghoul filled Vault 63, and fight off the new electrified "Lost" ghouls as they try to harness the storm. 
Later, in early 2025, Fallout 76 will also introduce something Fallout fans have wanted for a long time, the ability to play as a ghoul.

#gaming #fallout76 #gamespot
title: Fallout 76's Next Big Expansion & New Playable Ghouls

description: After making a major splash with many gamers when it was first introduced as a free game tied into purchasing a PS5, Astro Bot is finally getting its own full game! Astro Bot utilizes the many features of the PS5 gamepad for unique and fun gameplay, all centered around a collectathon platform celebrating the history of Playstation with around 150 cameos. From Parappa the Rapper to Bloodborne and Nathan Drake. Astro Bot is currently set to release September 6, 2024.
title: Astro Bot Finally Unleashes A Full-Scale Game | Summer Game Fest 2024
